title: Chicken fried rice with egg
ingredients: ['300g long grain rice', '2 tablespoons rapeseed oil, more as needed', '2 large eggs', '1 carrot, peeled and cut to approx pea sized pieces', '1 bunch spring onions, trimmed, washed and chopped', '2 large garlic cloves, finely chopped', '1 thumb sized piece fresh root ginger, peeled and finely chopped', '4 tablespoons frozen peas', '4 tablespoons frozen sweetcorn', '2 chicken stock cubes, crumbled', 'sesame oil', 'light soy sauce', '1/2 teaspoon white pepper', '4 roasted chicken thighs, skinned and boned']
